SELECT a.MABN PID_3, a.MAQL PV1_19, b.HOTEN_ME ADD_1, b.NS_ME ADD_2, b.MANN_ME ADD_3,b.DELAN ADD_4, b.HOTEN_BO ADD_5, b.NS_BO ADD_6, b.MANN_BO ADD_7, b.NHOMMAU ADD_8,b.PARA ADD_9, d.HOTEN_BO ADD_10, d.VANHOA_BO ADD_11, d.MANN_BO ADD_12, d.HOTEN_ME ADD_13,d.VANHOA_ME ADD_14, d.MANN_ME ADD_15, c.VANHOA ADD_16, to_char(e.NGAY,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ADD_17, f.ID_SS ADD_18,to_char(f.NGAY,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ADD_19, f.NGOITHAI ADD_20, f.PHAI ADD_21, f.TINHTRANG ADD_22, f.DITAT ADD_23,f.CANNANG ADD_24,to_char(g.NGAY,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ACC_1,decode(g.MABN,null,null,a.MAICD) ACC_2,g.DIADIEM ACC_3,g.BOPHAN ADD_26,g.NGUYENNHAN ADD_27,NGODOC ADD_28 FROM BENHANDT a,HCSOSINH b,HCNHI d,TRESOSINH f,TTBONG e,TTTAMTHAN c,TAINANTT g where a.mabn=b.mabn(+) and a.mabn=d.mabn(+) and a.MAQL = f.MAQL(+) and a.MAQL = e.MAQL(+) and a.MAQL = c.MAQL(+) and a.MAQL=g.MAQL(+)
